docs.text: Welcome Welcome to BotCity's Framework Base Python package for RPA. This package holds the common base code shared between all BotCity Python packages. Installation Latest release Using PyPI pip install botcity-framework-base Using conda-forge - Coming Soon conda install -c conda-forge botcity-framework-base Latest code pip install git + https : // github . com / botcity - dev / botcity - framework - base - python . git
